/api/mo/uni/infra/vlanns-[bm2acicni-pool]-static.json
{
    "fvnsVlanInstP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "bm2acicni-pool",
            "allocMode": "static",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "fvnsEncapBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "allocMode": "static",
                        "from": "vlan-2032",
                        "to": "vlan-2032",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            },
            {
                "fvnsEncapBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "allocMode": "static",
                        "from": "vlan-4003",
                        "to": "vlan-4003",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }

            "prefEncapMode": "vxlan",

    "infraAttEntityP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "sauto_aep",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"

        "children": [

/api/mo/uni/tn-common.json
{
    "fvTenant": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "common",
            "dn": "uni/tn-common"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vzFilter": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "bm2acicni-allow-all-filter",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzEntry": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            },
            {
                "vzBrCP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "bm2acicni-l3out-allow-all",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzSubj": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all-subj",
                                    "consMatchT": "AtleastOne",
                                    "provMatchT": "AtleastOne",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                },
                                "children": [
                                    {
                                        "vzRsSubjFiltAtt": {
                                            "attributes": {
                                                "tnVzFilterName": "bm2acicni-allow-all-filter",
                                                "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
